item.title: Public preview: Azure Bastion now support shareable links
item.description: Shareable links allows users to connect to target resources via Azure Bastion without access to the Azure portal.
item.atom:content: Shareable links allows users to connect to target resources via Azure Bastion without access to the Azure portal.

item.title: Generally available: Dapr support for managed identity in Azure Container Apps
item.description: Container Apps now provides support for using Dapr with Managed Identity.
item.atom:content: Container Apps now provides support for using Dapr with Managed Identity.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Container Apps Azure Monitor integration
item.description: Azure Container Apps now support using Azure Monitor to send your logs to additional destinations.
item.atom:content: Azure Container Apps now support using Azure Monitor to send your logs to additional destinations.

item.title: Public preview: Support for hybrid rendering with Next.js apps
item.description: Azure Static Web Apps now supports zero configuration deployment and hosting of hybrid-rendered Next.js applications.
item.atom:content: Azure Static Web Apps now supports zero configuration deployment and hosting of hybrid-rendered Next.js applications.

item.title: Generally available: Dapr secrets API support
item.description: You can now use Dapr secrets APIs from your Azure Container Apps and leverage Dapr secret store component references when creating other components in the environment.
item.atom:content: You can now use Dapr secrets APIs from your Azure Container Apps and leverage Dapr secret store component references when creating other components in the environment.

item.title: Public preview: Physical job diagram for Stream Analytics job troubleshooting
item.description: The physical job diagram provides rich, instant insights to your Stream Analytics job to help you quickly identify the causes of problems when you troubleshoot issues.
item.atom:content: The physical job diagram provides rich, instant insights to your Stream Analytics job to help you quickly identify the causes of problems when you troubleshoot issues.

item.title: Public preview: Native delta lake output connector
item.description: You can now configure a Stream Analytics job to write streaming data to either a new or an existing delta lake yable in Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.
item.atom:content: You can now configure a Stream Analytics job to write streaming data to either a new or an existing delta lake yable in Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

item.category: Azure Backup; SAP HANA Backup; HANA Snapshot
item.title: Public preview: Support for HANA Instance snapshot integrated with backint logs
item.description: Protect your large HANA databases in Azure Virtual Machines and recover them instantly with Azure Backup for HANA backint certified solution which now supports HANA snapshots.
item.atom:content: Protect your large HANA databases in Azure Virtual Machines and recover them instantly with Azure Backup for HANA backint certified solution which now supports HANA snapshots.

item.title: Azure Functions support for Node 12 is ending on 13 December 2022
item.description: Update your functions apps to use Azure Functions host version 4 and Node 16.
item.atom:content: Update your functions apps to use Azure Functions host version 4 and Node 16.

item.title: Integration Services Environment will be retired on 31 August 2024 – transition to Logic Apps Standard
item.description: Integration service environment in Azure Logic Apps will be retired on 31 August 2024.
item.atom:content: Integration service environment in Azure Logic Apps will be retired on 31 August 2024.

item.title: General availability: New Azure proximity placement groups feature
item.description: You can now use the new optional parameter "intent" to specify the VM sizes and zone intended for the proximity placement group.
item.atom:content: You can now use the new optional parameter "intent" to specify the VM sizes and zone intended for the proximity placement group.

item.title: General availability: Simplified disaster recovery for VMware machines using Azure Site Recovery
item.description: Today we’re officially announcing the general availability of a simpler, more reliable, and modernized way to protect your VMware virtual machines using Azure Site Recovery, for recovering quickly from disasters.
item.atom:content: Today we’re officially announcing the general availability of a simpler, more reliable, and modernized way to protect your VMware virtual machines using Azure Site Recovery, for recovering quickly from disasters.

item.title: Azure Batch Certificates will be retired on 29 February 2024
item.description: Retirement Notice: Transition to Azure Key Vault before 29 February 2024.
item.atom:content: Retirement Notice: Transition to Azure Key Vault before 29 February 2024.

item.title: Azure Static Web Apps extended support for .NET Core 3.1 ends on 3 December 2022
item.description: Post 3 December 2022, Azure Static Web Apps will end support for .NET Core 3.1.
item.atom:content: Post 3 December 2022, Azure Static Web Apps will end support for .NET Core 3.1.

item.title: Desired state configuration VM Extension for Linux, and Azure Automation DSC support for Linux, will be retired on 30 September 2023
item.description: PowerShell DSC Virtual Machine extension for Linux, and Azure Automation DSC support for Linux, will be retired on 30 September 2023
item.atom:content: PowerShell DSC Virtual Machine extension for Linux, and Azure Automation DSC support for Linux, will be retired on 30 September 2023

item.title: Action required: Support for Azure Monitor for SAP solutions (classic) resources will end by 31 March 2023
item.description: Azure Monitor for SAP Solutions (classic) is retiring. Support for Azure Monitor for SAP solutions (classic) resources will end by 31 March 2023. Please migrate to new version as soon as possible.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor for SAP Solutions (classic) is retiring. Support for Azure Monitor for SAP solutions (classic) resources will end by 31 March 2023. Please migrate to new version as soon as possible.

item.title: Action required: Support for Azure Monitor for SAP solutions (classic) resources will end by 31 March 2023.
item.description: Azure Monitor for SAP Solutions (classic) is retiring. Support for Azure Monitor for SAP solutions (classic) resources will end by 31 March 2023.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor for SAP Solutions (classic) is retiring. Support for Azure Monitor for SAP solutions (classic) resources will end by 31 March 2023.

item.title: Migrate to Azure Monitor VM insights by 30 September 2025 when Service Map will be retired
item.description: Azure Service Map will be retired on 30 September 2025.
item.atom:content: Azure Service Map will be retired on 30 September 2025.

item.title: Azure classic resource providers will be retired on 31 August 2024
item.description: Classic resource providers that use Azure Service Manager (classic deployment model) will be retired on 31 August 2024. Users will need to migrate their classic resource provider that uses classic deployment model (ASM) to Azure Resource Manager.
item.atom:content: Classic resource providers that use Azure Service Manager (classic deployment model) will be retired on 31 August 2024. Users will need to migrate their classic resource provider that uses classic deployment model (ASM) to Azure Resource Manager.

item.title: Upgrade to Standard SKU public IP addresses in Azure by 30 September 2025—Basic SKU will be retired
item.description: Basic SKU public IP addresses will be retired.
item.atom:content: Basic SKU public IP addresses will be retired.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Firewall Basic
item.description: Azure Firewall Basic provides cost-effective, enterprise-grade network security for small and medium businesses (SMBs).
item.atom:content: Azure Firewall Basic provides cost-effective, enterprise-grade network security for small and medium businesses (SMBs).

item.title: Generally available: Query Store hints Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Managed Instance
item.description: Shape your query plans without changing the code.
item.atom:content: Shape your query plans without changing the code.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning—General availability updates for September 2022
item.description: New features include the ability to establish event-driven notifications and the capability to label data in text documents using text named-identity recognition.
item.atom:content: New features include the ability to establish event-driven notifications and the capability to label data in text documents using text named-identity recognition.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning—Public preview updates for September 2022
item.description: Includes the ability to control access to sensitive data, the capability to contrast differences to assess their performance, and the functionality to stop idle compute instances automatically.
item.atom:content: Includes the ability to control access to sensitive data, the capability to contrast differences to assess their performance, and the functionality to stop idle compute instances automatically.

item.title: General availability: Smart tiering to vault-archive tier for Azure Backup
item.description: You can now configure your backup policy to move all your eligible and recommended recovery points to vault-archive tier for Azure Virtual Machines, SQL Server/SAP HANA in Azure Virtual Machines.
item.atom:content: You can now configure your backup policy to move all your eligible and recommended recovery points to vault-archive tier for Azure Virtual Machines, SQL Server/SAP HANA in Azure Virtual Machines.

item.title: Generally available: Scale-down mode in AKS
item.description: You can now select if you would like your AKS nodes to be deleted or deallocated when scaled down.
item.atom:content: You can now select if you would like your AKS nodes to be deleted or deallocated when scaled down.

item.title: Generally available: Node pool snapshot
item.description: You can now take a snapshot of the node pool configuration and then create a node pool from that snapshot.
item.atom:content: You can now take a snapshot of the node pool configuration and then create a node pool from that snapshot.

item.title: Generally available: Group Managed Service Accounts security policy support on Windows
item.description: AKS now supports Group Managed Service Accounts (GMSA) configuration, as well as maintaining trust during scale operations in the Windows nodepool.
item.atom:content: AKS now supports Group Managed Service Accounts (GMSA) configuration, as well as maintaining trust during scale operations in the Windows nodepool.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Container Apps built-in authentication Microsoft Azure Container Apps
item.description: Use configured identify providers to sign in to your container apps by writing little or no code.
item.atom:content: Use configured identify providers to sign in to your container apps by writing little or no code.

item.title: Generally available: Controls to block domain fronting behavior on customer resources
item.description: Block domain fronting behavior on Azure Front Door, Azure Front Door (classic), and Azure CDN Standard from Microsoft (classic) resources.
item.atom:content: Block domain fronting behavior on Azure Front Door, Azure Front Door (classic), and Azure CDN Standard from Microsoft (classic) resources.

item.title: General availability: App Service - Networking capabilities added to Basic pricing tier
item.description: Virtual network integration and private endpoints now supported in Basic pricing tier.
item.atom:content: Virtual network integration and private endpoints now supported in Basic pricing tier.

item.title: Public preview: App Service - Configure networking in Azure Portal during app creation
item.description: VNet integration and private endpoints options now configurable when creating a web application.
item.atom:content: VNet integration and private endpoints options now configurable when creating a web application.

item.title: General availability: Windows Server guest licensing offer for Azure Stack HCI
item.description: Bring simplicity and flexibility to licensing when you purchase unlimited Windows Server guest licenses for your Azure Stack HCI cluster through your Azure subscription.
item.atom:content: Bring simplicity and flexibility to licensing when you purchase unlimited Windows Server guest licenses for your Azure Stack HCI cluster through your Azure subscription.

item.title: Generally available: Rehydrate an archived blob to a different storage account
item.description: Segregate your backup data in different storage accounts with Archive across-accounts copy.
item.atom:content: Segregate your backup data in different storage accounts with Archive across-accounts copy.

item.title: Public preview: Stable URLs for preview environments in Azure Static Web Apps
item.description: Azure Static Web Apps preview deployments now support stable URLs.
item.atom:content: Azure Static Web Apps preview deployments now support stable URLs.

item.title: General availability: Azure Archive Storage now available in Switzerland North
item.description: Reduce spending by storing cold data to Azure Archive Storage, now in new regions.
item.atom:content: Reduce spending by storing cold data to Azure Archive Storage, now in new regions.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor and Azure Managed Grafana integrations
item.description: New Grafana integrations with Azure Monitor include the ability to pin Azure Monitor visualizations from Azure Portal to Grafana dashboards and new out-of-the-box Azure Monitor dashboards.
item.atom:content: New Grafana integrations with Azure Monitor include the ability to pin Azure Monitor visualizations from Azure Portal to Grafana dashboards and new out-of-the-box Azure Monitor dashboards.

item.title: Generally available: Azure SQL Migration extension for Azure Data Studio
item.description: Assess, receive Azure recommendations, and then migrate your SQL Server databases using the Azure SQL Migration extension in Azure Data Studio.
item.atom:content: Assess, receive Azure recommendations, and then migrate your SQL Server databases using the Azure SQL Migration extension in Azure Data Studio.

item.title: General availability: Azure Cosmos DB autoscale RU/s entry point is 4x lower
item.description: Set autoscale on your database or container with a new scale range of 100 RU/s – 1000 RU/s.
item.atom:content: Set autoscale on your database or container with a new scale range of 100 RU/s – 1000 RU/s.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Cosmos DB API for MongoDB unique index re-indexing
item.description: Unique indexes can now be created in existing collections with data in the API for MongoDB.
item.atom:content: Unique indexes can now be created in existing collections with data in the API for MongoDB.

item.title: General availability: Zone redundancy for Azure SQL Database general purpose tier
item.description: Make your general purpose provisioned and serverless Azure SQL databases and elastic pools more resilient with catastrophic datacenter outages, without any changes of the application logic by selecting zone redundancy.
item.atom:content: Make your general purpose provisioned and serverless Azure SQL databases and elastic pools more resilient with catastrophic datacenter outages, without any changes of the application logic by selecting zone redundancy.

item.title: Azure SQL—Public preview updates for mid-April 2022
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL.
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL.

item.title: Public preview: Azure SQL Database Hyperscale reverse migration to general purpose tier
item.description: Easily move your previously migrated databases on Azure SQL Database Hyperscale back to the general purpose tier.
item.atom:content: Easily move your previously migrated databases on Azure SQL Database Hyperscale back to the general purpose tier.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitoring Agent supports custom and IIS logs
item.description: New collection types supported by Azure Monitoring Agent that extends beyond the standard data available today.
item.atom:content: New collection types supported by Azure Monitoring Agent that extends beyond the standard data available today.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Static Web Apps support for private endpoints
item.description: Azure Static Web Apps support for private endpoints is now generally available with a 99.95 SLA for production and staging environments.
item.atom:content: Azure Static Web Apps support for private endpoints is now generally available with a 99.95 SLA for production and staging environments.

item.title: Public preview: Metrics and alerts support in Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now view metrics for your Azure Container Apps and setup alerts for metric thresholds and Log Analytic queries.
item.atom:content: You can now view metrics for your Azure Container Apps and setup alerts for metric thresholds and Log Analytic queries.

item.title: Public preview: Health probes support in Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now use readiness, liveness, and startup probes in your Azure Container Apps.
item.atom:content: You can now use readiness, liveness, and startup probes in your Azure Container Apps.

item.title: Public preview: Visual Studio support for Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now publish .NET Core applications to Azure Container Apps from Visual Studio 2022 Preview 2.
item.atom:content: You can now publish .NET Core applications to Azure Container Apps from Visual Studio 2022 Preview 2.

item.title: Public preview: Visual Studio Code extension for Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now deploy and manage Azure Container Apps from Visual Studio Code.
item.atom:content: You can now deploy and manage Azure Container Apps from Visual Studio Code.

item.title: Generally available: IBM WebSphere on Azure with evaluation licensing
item.description: Use evaluation licenses, instead of full entitlements, for WebSphere on Azure Virtual Machines for trial and prototyping.
item.atom:content: Use evaluation licenses, instead of full entitlements, for WebSphere on Azure Virtual Machines for trial and prototyping.

item.title: Public preview: Managed identities support in Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now use managed identities with Azure Container Apps instead of passing secrets in connection strings.
item.atom:content: You can now use managed identities with Azure Container Apps instead of passing secrets in connection strings.

item.title: Public preview: Support for Windows clients using Azure Monitor agent
item.description: Using the new Windows client installer launched today, you can now get the benefits of the new agent and data collection rules on your Windows 10 and 11 client devices.
item.atom:content: Using the new Windows client installer launched today, you can now get the benefits of the new agent and data collection rules on your Windows 10 and 11 client devices.

item.title: Generally available: Java 17 and Tomcat 10.0 on Azure App Service
item.description: Use new supported versions of Java and Tomcat to run web applications on Azure App Service.
item.atom:content: Use new supported versions of Java and Tomcat to run web applications on Azure App Service.

item.title: Generally available: new result set grid in Azure Monitor log analytics
item.description: The new result set grid in log analytics boasts a brand-new experience, introduces numerous new features, and is much easier to use!
item.atom:content: The new result set grid in log analytics boasts a brand-new experience, introduces numerous new features, and is much easier to use!

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor activity log insights
item.description: Azure Monitor activity log insights let you view information about changes to resources and resource groups in a subscription.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor activity log insights let you view information about changes to resources and resource groups in a subscription.

item.title: Public preview: Redesign of alerts summary (landing) page
item.description: The summary (landing) page for alerts has been simplified to improve usability and actionability.
item.atom:content: The summary (landing) page for alerts has been simplified to improve usability and actionability.

item.title: Public preview: Recommended alert rules for virtual machines
item.description: You can now enable a set of recommended alert rules for your existing virtual machines.
item.atom:content: You can now enable a set of recommended alert rules for your existing virtual machines.

item.title: Generally available: Migrate devices across templates at scale in Azure IoT Central
item.description: Migrating devices across device templates at scale is now supported in Azure IoT Central jobs.
item.atom:content: Migrating devices across device templates at scale is now supported in Azure IoT Central jobs.

item.title: General availability: Azure Sphere OS version 22.04
item.description: Azure Sphere OS quality release 22.04 is available now.
item.atom:content: Azure Sphere OS quality release 22.04 is available now.

item.title: Generally available: Service tags support for user-defined routing
item.description: Simplify route creation and management by using service tags to represent multiple IP ranges in a single user-defined route.
item.atom:content: Simplify route creation and management by using service tags to represent multiple IP ranges in a single user-defined route.

item.title: Generally available: Customize application text labels in Azure IoT Central
item.description: You can now replace ‘Device’ label in your Azure IoT Central application with your preferred text.
item.atom:content: You can now replace ‘Device’ label in your Azure IoT Central application with your preferred text.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Databricks Delta Live Tables
item.description: Build reliable, maintainable, and testable data processing pipelines with Delta Live Tables.
item.atom:content: Build reliable, maintainable, and testable data processing pipelines with Delta Live Tables.

item.title: General availability: Glossary terms in Azure Purview data catalog search
item.description: The Azure Purview data catalog search experience now includes glossary terms in the search results.
item.atom:content: The Azure Purview data catalog search experience now includes glossary terms in the search results.

item.title: Generally available: DNS reservations to prevent subdomain takeover in Cloud Services deployments
item.description: As a preventive measure, DNS record is reserved for seven days to allow clean-up of dangling DNS domains or reclaim from same Azure Active Directory tenant only.
item.atom:content: As a preventive measure, DNS record is reserved for seven days to allow clean-up of dangling DNS domains or reclaim from same Azure Active Directory tenant only.

item.title: Update: Azure AD Graph retirement date
item.description: Update your apps to use Microsoft Graph.
item.atom:content: Update your apps to use Microsoft Graph.

item.title: Generally available: Diagnostic audit logs for Automation accounts
item.description: Forward Azure Automation diagnostic audit logs to Log analytics workspace to keep track of changes at the automation account level.
item.atom:content: Forward Azure Automation diagnostic audit logs to Log analytics workspace to keep track of changes at the automation account level.

item.title: General availability: Azure Backup now supports vault-archive tier for Azure VMs
item.description: Azure Backup now provides the capability to move long term retention (LTR) recovery points to low-cost archive tier for Azure Virtual Machines.
item.atom:content: Azure Backup now provides the capability to move long term retention (LTR) recovery points to low-cost archive tier for Azure Virtual Machines.

item.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer supports Azure private endpoints
item.description: Enhance your security posture by leveraging Azure private endpoints to connect to your Azure Data Explorer cluster privately
item.atom:content: Enhance your security posture by leveraging Azure private endpoints to connect to your Azure Data Explorer cluster privately

item.title: Generally available: Azure storage table access using Azure Active Directory
item.description: Accessing Azure storage table using Azure AD for authentication and Azure RBAC for authorization provides superior security over using shared key for access.
item.atom:content: Accessing Azure storage table using Azure AD for authentication and Azure RBAC for authorization provides superior security over using shared key for access.

item.title: Generally available: Support for Private Link in Azure IoT Central
item.description: Enhance your security posture by privately connecting devices to Azure IoT Central via private endpoint, eliminating exposure to the public internet.
item.atom:content: Enhance your security posture by privately connecting devices to Azure IoT Central via private endpoint, eliminating exposure to the public internet.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Backup supports metrics and metric alerts for Azure Blobs
item.description: You can now monitor the restore job health of your backed up blobs via Azure Monitor metrics and write custom alert rules on these metrics.
item.atom:content: You can now monitor the restore job health of your backed up blobs via Azure Monitor metrics and write custom alert rules on these metrics.

item.title: Public preview: Capacity reservation support in AKS
item.description: You can now use reserved capacity with AKS via the capacity reservation feature.
item.atom:content: You can now use reserved capacity with AKS via the capacity reservation feature.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Virtual Machines increase storage throughput by up to 300%
item.description: Microsoft is announcing the general availability of the Ebs/Ebds v5 memory optimized Azure VM series, that deliver up to 300% increase in remote storage performance compared to prior generation VMs.
item.atom:content: Microsoft is announcing the general availability of the Ebs/Ebds v5 memory optimized Azure VM series, that deliver up to 300% increase in remote storage performance compared to prior generation VMs.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Virtual Machines DCsv3 available in Switzerland and West US
item.description: Confidential computing DCsv3 and DCdsv3-series virtual machines (VMs) are in preview in Switzerland North and West US.
item.atom:content: Confidential computing DCsv3 and DCdsv3-series virtual machines (VMs) are in preview in Switzerland North and West US.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Data Explorer Inline script deployment with ARM Template
item.description: We can now build an entire Azure Data Explorer environment with ARM template. Schema entities (e.g. tables, functions, policies) can be deployed without an external storage account.
item.atom:content: We can now build an entire Azure Data Explorer environment with ARM template. Schema entities (e.g. tables, functions, policies) can be deployed without an external storage account.

item.title: Generally available: Support for copying tiles added to Azure IoT Central
item.description: IoT Central customers will now be able to quickly build new visuals in their dashboards by simply copying an existing tile.
item.atom:content: IoT Central customers will now be able to quickly build new visuals in their dashboards by simply copying an existing tile.

item.title: Public preview: Arm64-based Azure VMs can deliver up to 50% better price-performance
item.description: New general-purpose and memory-optimized Azure Virtual Machines, which feature Ampere Altra Arm-based processors, deliver even better price-performance than comparable x86-based Azure Linux Virtual Machines.
item.atom:content: New general-purpose and memory-optimized Azure Virtual Machines, which feature Ampere Altra Arm-based processors, deliver even better price-performance than comparable x86-based Azure Linux Virtual Machines.

item.title: Generally available: Apache Kafka 2.4 in Azure HDinsight
item.description: Apache Kafka 2.4 is now in Azure HDinsight.
item.atom:content: Apache Kafka 2.4 is now in Azure HDinsight.

item.title: Generally available: Apache Spark 3.1.2 in Azure HDinsight
item.description: Spark 3.1 is now generally available on HDInsight 4.0 release across all regions.
item.atom:content: Spark 3.1 is now generally available on HDInsight 4.0 release across all regions.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Bastion support for Kerberos authentication
item.description: Azure Bastion now supports the Kerberos authentication protocol in public preview.
item.atom:content: Azure Bastion now supports the Kerberos authentication protocol in public preview.

item.title: Public preview: Simplified compute node communication
item.description: Azure Batch offers simplified, efficient node communication within the Batch pool and Azure resources (storage, AppPackage storage accounts, output files, and other resources).
item.atom:content: Azure Batch offers simplified, efficient node communication within the Batch pool and Azure resources (storage, AppPackage storage accounts, output files, and other resources).

item.title: Public preview: Azure Arc integration with VMware vSphere and Azure VMware Solution
item.description: Manage the lifecycle and guest OS operations of VMware vSphere VMs through Azure Arc by connecting your VMware vCenter servers (on-premises or on Azure VMware Solution) to Azure.
item.atom:content: Manage the lifecycle and guest OS operations of VMware vSphere VMs through Azure Arc by connecting your VMware vCenter servers (on-premises or on Azure VMware Solution) to Azure.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Stream Analytics in 10 new regions
item.description: Azure Stream Analytics is a fully managed, real-time analytics service designed to help you analyze and process fast moving streams of data.
item.atom:content: Azure Stream Analytics is a fully managed, real-time analytics service designed to help you analyze and process fast moving streams of data.

item.title: General availability: Bring your own IP ranges to Azure
item.description: Bring your own public IP ranges to Azure to retain existing reputation or to prevent your customers from needing to modify dependencies (e.g. firewalls or other hardcoding) on their network.
item.atom:content: Bring your own public IP ranges to Azure to retain existing reputation or to prevent your customers from needing to modify dependencies (e.g. firewalls or other hardcoding) on their network.

item.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer supports Conditional Access
item.description: Azure Data Explorer launches support for Azure Active Directory Conditional Access.
item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer launches support for Azure Active Directory Conditional Access.

item.title: Azure SQL—Public preview updates for late March 2022
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late March 2022.
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late March 2022.

item.title: Public preview: Azure SQL Migration extension with Azure PowerShell and CLI support
item.description: Leverage Azure PowerShell module (Az.DataMigration) or Azure CLI commands (az datamigration) for recommendations and migrate SQL Server databases using Azure Database Migration Service with Azure SQL Migration extensions for ADS.
item.atom:content: Leverage Azure PowerShell module (Az.DataMigration) or Azure CLI commands (az datamigration) for recommendations and migrate SQL Server databases using Azure Database Migration Service with Azure SQL Migration extensions for ADS.

item.title: General availability: Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Hyperscale (Citus) now FedRAMP High compliant
item.description: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Hyperscale (Citus), a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure is now compliant with FedRAMP High.
item.atom:content: Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Hyperscale (Citus), a managed service running the open-source Postgres database on Azure is now compliant with FedRAMP High.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Cosmos DB partition key advisor notebook
item.description: The Azure Cosmos DB partition key advisor notebook helps recommend an optimal partition key based on information you provide about your workload traffic patterns and queries.
item.atom:content: The Azure Cosmos DB partition key advisor notebook helps recommend an optimal partition key based on information you provide about your workload traffic patterns and queries.

item.title: General availability: Always Encrypted for Azure Cosmos DB
item.description: The Always Encrypted feature brings client-side encryption capabilities to Azure Cosmos DB and allows you to put an extra level of protection on your sensitive data.
item.atom:content: The Always Encrypted feature brings client-side encryption capabilities to Azure Cosmos DB and allows you to put an extra level of protection on your sensitive data.

item.title: General availability: Azure Cognitive Search implements debug sessions
item.description: Streamline your Cognitive Search operations with debug sessions for building, testing, and modifying skillsets.
item.atom:content: Streamline your Cognitive Search operations with debug sessions for building, testing, and modifying skillsets.

item.title: Public preview: Edge Device Image Builder
item.description: Edge Device Image Builder assists device builders and OEMs by providing a guided experience to build secure and customized Windows IoT Enterprise LTSC 2021 device images.
item.atom:content: Edge Device Image Builder assists device builders and OEMs by providing a guided experience to build secure and customized Windows IoT Enterprise LTSC 2021 device images.

item.title: Generally available: Cross-region snapshot copy for Azure Disk Storage
item.description: Cross-region snapshot copy allows you to copy disk snapshots to any region for disaster recovery.
item.atom:content: Cross-region snapshot copy allows you to copy disk snapshots to any region for disaster recovery.

item.title: General availability: Azure Ultra Disk Storage in Sweden Central
item.description: Azure Ultra Disk Storage provides high-performance along with sub-millisecond latency for your most-demanding workloads.
item.atom:content: Azure Ultra Disk Storage provides high-performance along with sub-millisecond latency for your most-demanding workloads.

item.title: Generally available: Node.js 16 in Azure Functions
item.description: Azure Functions support for Node.js 16.x is now generally available in Azure Functions runtime 4.0 on all hosting plans.
item.atom:content: Azure Functions support for Node.js 16.x is now generally available in Azure Functions runtime 4.0 on all hosting plans.

item.title: Public preview: Azure dedicated host support in AKS
item.description: You can now use Azure Dedicated Hosts with the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.atom:content: You can now use Azure Dedicated Hosts with the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)

item.title: Public preview: Node auto-drain for AKS
item.description: AKS now minimizes unexpected disruptions by handling maintenance events and offloading applications via auto-drain node feature.
item.atom:content: AKS now minimizes unexpected disruptions by handling maintenance events and offloading applications via auto-drain node feature.

item.title: Azure classic storage accounts will be retired on 31 August 2024
item.description: Migrate your classic storage accounts to Azure Resource Manager by 31 August 2024.
item.atom:content: Migrate your classic storage accounts to Azure Resource Manager by 31 August 2024.

item.title: NV-series and NV Promo Azure Virtual Machines retirement extended to 31 August 2023
item.description: Move to GPU accelerated virtual machines by 31 August 2023.
item.atom:content: Move to GPU accelerated virtual machines by 31 August 2023.

item.title: ND-series Azure Virtual Machines retirement extended to 31 August 2023
item.description: Transition to new HPC virtual machines by 31 August 2023.
item.atom:content: Transition to new HPC virtual machines by 31 August 2023.

item.title: Update: NV-series and NV_Promo Azure Virtual Machines will be retired on 31 August 2023
item.description: Move to GPU accelerated virtual machines by 31 August 2023.
item.atom:content: Move to GPU accelerated virtual machines by 31 August 2023.

item.title: Update: ND-series Azure Virtual Machines will be retired on 31 August 2023
item.description: Transition to new HPC virtual machines by 31 August 2023.

item.category: Azure Blob Storage; Azure Data Lake Storage; Storage Accounts; AzurePortal

item.atom:content: Access time tracking for objects and lifecycle management policies based on last accessed time in Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

item.title: Generally available: The new Azure Front Door – a modern cloud CDN service
item.description: Azure Front Door is a modern cloud CDN that enables you to accelerate the delivery of applications, APIs, and content on Azure or anywhere at scale.
item.atom:content: Azure Front Door is a modern cloud CDN that enables you to accelerate the delivery of applications, APIs, and content on Azure or anywhere at scale.

item.title: App Service Environment version 1 and version 2 will be retired on 31 August 2024
item.description: Migrate to App Service Environment version 3 by 31 August 2024.
item.atom:content: Migrate to App Service Environment version 3 by 31 August 2024.

item.title: IoT connector preview feature in Azure API for FHIR retiring on 30 September 2022
item.description: Migrate to MedTech service feature which provides stronger security and supportability.
item.atom:content: Migrate to MedTech service feature which provides stronger security and supportability.

item.title: Generally available: Copy data directly to Archive Storage with Data Box
item.description: You can now use Data Box to copy data directly to Archive tier by indicating this when ordering and then copying to the corresponding share on the Data Box.
item.atom:content: You can now use Data Box to copy data directly to Archive tier by indicating this when ordering and then copying to the corresponding share on the Data Box.

item.title: In development: New planned datacenter region in India (India South Central)
item.description: Microsoft has announced plans to bring a new datacenter region to India, including availability zones.
item.atom:content: Microsoft has announced plans to bring a new datacenter region to India, including availability zones.

item.title: Generally available: On-demand capacity reservation with Azure Site Recovery safeguards VMs failover
item.description: Integrating Site Recovery with capacity reservation to reserve compute capacity in the disaster recovery region and use that for failover.
item.atom:content: Integrating Site Recovery with capacity reservation to reserve compute capacity in the disaster recovery region and use that for failover.

item.title: General availability: Azure Bastion native client support
item.description: Azure Bastion native client support brings you the ability to connect to target VMs from the command line and log in using your Azure Active Directory credentials.
item.atom:content: Azure Bastion native client support brings you the ability to connect to target VMs from the command line and log in using your Azure Active Directory credentials.

item.title: General availability: On-demand capacity reservations
item.description: On-demand capacity reservations let you reserve compute capacity for one or more VM size(s) in an Azure region or availability zone for any length of time.
item.atom:content: On-demand capacity reservations let you reserve compute capacity for one or more VM size(s) in an Azure region or availability zone for any length of time.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Batch supports Spot Virtual Machines
item.description: Azure Batch supports Spot Virtual Machine's in user-subscription mode and is offered at a significantly reduced price compared with dedicated virtual machines.
item.atom:content: Azure Batch supports Spot Virtual Machine's in user-subscription mode and is offered at a significantly reduced price compared with dedicated virtual machines.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Percept DK March (2203) software update
item.description: The Azure Percept March update includes fixes related to security.
item.atom:content: The Azure Percept March update includes fixes related to security.

item.title: Operator Assistance in Azure MFA will be retired on 30 September 2023
item.description: Turn off Operator Assistance and enable automated attendant features for phone system.
item.atom:content: Turn off Operator Assistance and enable automated attendant features for phone system.

item.title: Classic data export in Azure IoT Central will be retired by 31 March 2023
item.description: Migrate to new data exports in Azure IoT Central before 31 March 2023.
item.atom:content: Migrate to new data exports in Azure IoT Central before 31 March 2023.

item.title: Public preview: User-assigned managed identities in Stream Analytics
item.description: You can now use user-assigned managed identity to authenticate your Stream Analytics jobs to inputs and outputs without ever having to worry about credential management.
item.atom:content: You can now use user-assigned managed identity to authenticate your Stream Analytics jobs to inputs and outputs without ever having to worry about credential management.

item.atom:content: Accelerate Apache Spark in Azure Synapse execution speed using the new intelligent cache feature.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Data Explorer supports multiple databases per data connection

item.atom:content: Dynamically route Azure Data Explorer data to an alternate database

item.title: General availability: Azure Machine Learning user-defined functions in Azure Stream Analytics
item.description: Machine Learning user-defined function in Stream Analytics allows you to perform high throughput, low latency, real-time predictions, allowing you to act on insights which have a very short shelf-life.
item.atom:content: Machine Learning user-defined function in Stream Analytics allows you to perform high throughput, low latency, real-time predictions, allowing you to act on insights which have a very short shelf-life.

item.title: Templates functionality preview version in Azure portal will be retired on 31 March 2025

item.atom:content: Start using template specs in the Azure portal before 31 March 2025.

item.atom:content: We’re retiring Azure Time Series Insights on 31 March 2025 – transition to Azure Data Explorer

item.description: You can now specify target backend pool in inbound NAT rule for less management overhead when configuring port forwarding.
item.atom:content: You can now specify target backend pool in inbound NAT rule for less management overhead when configuring port forwarding.

item.atom:content: Migrate to custom question answering before Azure QnA Maker is retired on 31 March 2025.

item.atom:content: You now have the ability to connect your devices, send data, run commands, and create relationships without having to first create a model for them in Azure IoT Central.

item.atom:content: Use Azure Synapse Spark 3.1 to partition your Azure Cosmos DB data in analytical store for improved query performance.

item.atom:content: Trusted launch virtual machine (VM) support for VMs using Ephemeral OS disks improves the security of generation 2 VMs in Azure.

item.atom:content: Integrating Site Recovery with capacity reservation to reserve compute capacity in the disaster recovery region and use that for failover.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Purview workflows

item.atom:content: You can now manage approvals for business terms or self-service data access requests for your entire data estate without having to use manual controls like emails or worksheets.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Backup support for trusted launch Azure Virtual Machines

item.atom:content: Trusted Launch VM Backup support from Azure Backup helps to protect Trusted Launch VMs which improves the security of generation 2 VMs in Azure.

item.atom:content: Azure Chaos Studio has new faults available for denying access to a Key Vault and shutting down a Classic Cloud Service.

item.title: Public preview: Schedule automated emails of your saved cost views

item.atom:content: Subscribe to daily, weekly, or monthly updates of your saved cost views in Azure Cost Management to stay informed about changes in cost.

item.title: General availability: SOAP and XML request and response validation

item.atom:content: Minimize API attack surface for SOAP or XML- based REST APIs with custom schemas in addition to the schemas specified in the API's definition.

item.atom:content: The Azure Percept February update includes fixes related to security.

item.description: The feature that allows you to configure multiple backups per day for Azure Files via backup policy is now generally available.
item.atom:content: The feature that allows you to configure multiple backups per day for Azure Files via backup policy is now generally available.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Spring Cloud Enterprise

item.atom:content: Azure Spring Cloud Enterprise includes fully managed VMware Tanzu components to help you ship faster as well as long term support for Spring projects to unlock Spring’s full potential.

item.atom:content: Enable frontend mutual authentication and listener specific SSL policies on Application Gateway, now generally available.

item.title: General availability: Localization available in Azure Purview
